Judul: THE EFFECT OF HUMAN RESOURCES PRACTICES TOWARDS HEALTHCARE WORKER MOTIVATION IN COVID-19 PANDEMIC  SITUATION IN RSUD BANDUNG KIWARI
Abstrak:
The Covid-19 virus poses a threat to human respiration and, in the worst cases of Covid19
can

causes death. Healthcare worker has a significant part in handling Covid-19.  Given the
crucial role that healthcare professionals play in this pandemic condition, this study aims to know
are performance appraisal affects the work motivation of healthcare worker, know are rewards
affects the work motivation of healthcare worker. It will also determine how performance appraisal
and rewards affect the work motivation of healthcare worker at the RSUD Bandung Kiwari. This
research using a quantitative strategy that given 84 respondents. The methodology used in this
research are Multiple Linear Regression that runs by SPSS 25. The findings of this study suggest
that while Performance Appraisal and Rewards work together to increase motivation, Performance
Appraisal alone has a positive impact on it. Rewards, on the other hand, have a negative impact.  
 
Keyword: HR Practices, Performance Appraisal, Rewards, Motivation.
Kata Kunci: HR Practices, Performance Appraisal, Rewards, Motivation,
